42.eng-name: The Book of Hunting and Slaughtering

hadiths.text: It was narrated that from Ibn Abi Qatadah, from Abu Qatadah, that:he caught an onager and brought it to his companion's who were in Ihram whereas he was not, and they ate from it. Then they said to one another: "Let us ask the Messenger of Allah about it," So we asked him and he said:" You did well" Then he said to us: "Do you have anything left of it?" We said: "Yes." He said: "Give us some "So we brought him some, and he ate from it, while he was in Ihram

chapter.ara-name: باب إِبَاحَةِ أَكْلِ لُحُومِ حُمُرِ الْوَحْشِ
chapter.eng-name: Permissibility Of Eating The Flesh Of Onagers (Wild Donkeys)
